TopicTitle: How to make Steam run 64 bit.

Articles.Content:
I made a thread in Tutorials about how to make steam run 64 bit version of KSP.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86488-How-to-make-Steam-run-64-bit

While the effort is certainly appreciated, starting a thread for the express purpose of saying that you've started a thread elsewhere is generally considered bad form.

With that said, I'll be closing this one now
